nodes.text: The Innovator was an Elite-class research vessel designed by the engineer Vam Targes and constructed by the insectoid Cyclorrians at the shipyards over the planet Cyclor during the High Republic Era. Over 300 meters long, the Innovator featured the latest scientific and medical equipment of the time, including cybernetic workshops, bioengineering labs, a medical library, analysis stations, and research facilities. The vessel was run by a network of forty-two intellex-grade droid processors and supported by a multi-motion framework. The Innovator was a showpiece at the Republic Fair on Valo, but was later sunk in Lake Lonisa during an attack by the Nihil.
